message: I have implemented `greedy_cos_idf` in `bert_score_goal.py` by computing normalized embeddings, masking invalid tokens, performing greedy matching with cosine similarities, applying IDF weights, and returning the F1 BERTScore per batch. Please review and let me know if further adjustments are needed!
